display_long_description:
Step into Office Chaos Simulator VR, the ultimate office game, job simulator, and workplace chaos sandbox for Meta Quest players who love funny destruction, physics action, and nonstop office madness. Explore a fully interactive office life simulator where every desk, chair, computer, printer, and break room object can be smashed, thrown, broken, or used for hilarious workplace pranks. Turn a normal workday into pure job chaos with silly tasks, office accidents, and unpredictable coworker reactions.

Use playful tools like a foam blaster, toy shooter, baseball bat prop, toy bat, rubber hammer, and office gadgets to create harmless, comedic destruction. Prank office workers, annoy the boss, interrupt meetings, flip desks, and confuse the friendly security guard trying to keep order. Enjoy exaggerated ragdoll physics, physics sandbox freedom, and endless opportunities for office pranks, boss simulator challenges, and funny job moments.

Move through multiple rooms in free-play mode, experiment with office destruction, complete goofy job tasks, and create your own chaotic story as the funniest — or worst — employee ever. Perfect for players who enjoy office simulator games, job chaos games, prank simulators, stress relief, action sandbox gameplay, and office worker roleplay.

Smash, prank, break, throw, laugh, and repeat in the most entertaining Office Simulator VR experience packed with office fun, job comedy, workplace destruction, and nonstop physics chaos for Meta Quest.
